column1: * 1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letters letter 150 and letter 151.
* 1954 - Naomi Mitchison published a review of The Fellowship of the Ring in the wikipedia:New Statesman.
* 1955 - Voice actor Bob Papenbrook is born.
* 1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Elsie Honeybourne (18 September 1967).
* 1981 - Extracts from J.R.R. Tolkiens "The Name Coventry" is published in The Catholic Herald (18 September 1981).
* 1982 - The tenth episode of the new version of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
* 2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at Mortensen Hall in wikipedia:Hartford
* 2006 - The Children of Húrin is announced.
** Gwaihir rescues Gandalf from the pinnacle of Orthanc in the early hours.
** The Nazgûl cross the Fords of Isen.
** The Black Riders visit Saruman who lies that Gandalf has "confessed"
column2: and gives them directions to the Shire.Marquette 4/2/33
